column1:
a. 
This report is made pursuant to the requirement to report suspicious transactions under the Financial Transaction Reporting 
Act, No. 6 of 2006 
b. 
Under Section 12 of the Act, no civil, criminal or disciplinary proceedings shall be brought against a person who makes 
such report in good faith
